thread.title: BRIEF-Cosmo Lady China Holdings Co Sees 28% To 35% rise in FY profit​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cosmo Lady China Holdings Co Sees 28% To 35% rise in FY profit​

organizations.name: cosmo lady china holdings co ltd

text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - Cosmo Lady China Holdings Co Ltd :
* ‍EXPECTED THAT PROFIT FOR YEAR WOULD INCREASE BY APPROXIMATELY 28 PCT TO 35 PCT​
* EXPECTED RESULT DUE TO IMPLEMENTATION OF A NUMBER OF MEASURES BY CO DURING YEAR TO TIGHTEN COST CONTROLS
* ‍EXPECTED THAT REVENUE FOR SECOND HALF OF YEAR HAS IMPROVED BY APPROXIMATELY 5 PCT TO 9 PCT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
